`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.h4,{children:"TestCode"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:54,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`import { render, screen } from '@testing-library/react';
import SummaryPage from '../index';

test('checkbox and Button', () => {
  render(<SummaryPage />);
  const checkbox = screen.getByRole('checkbox', {
    name: '\uC8FC\uBB38\uD558\uB824\uB294 \uAC83\uC744 \uD655\uC778\uD558\uC168\uB098\uC694?',
  });
  expect(checkbox.checked).toEqual(false);
  // \uCC98\uC74C\uC5D0\uB294 \uCCB4\uD06C\uBC15\uC2A4\uAC00 \uC124\uC815\uC774 \uC548\uB418\uC5B4\uC788\uC5B4\uC11C false\uC784
  const confirmButton = screen.getByRole('button', { name: '\uC8FC\uBB38 \uD655\uC778' });
  expect(confirmButton.disabled).toBeTruthy();
  //true\uB85C \uCDE8\uAE09\uB418\uB294 \uAD6C\uBB38\uC744 \uD655\uC778
});
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"\uC704\uC640 \uAC19\uC774 \uD14C\uC2A4\uD2B8\uCF54\uB4DC\uB97C \uC791\uC131\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uB2E4."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:73,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"\uAE30\uB2A5 \uCF54\uB4DC"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:75,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`import React, { useState } from 'react';

function SummaryPage() {
  const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false);
  return (
    <div>
      <form>
        <input
          type="checkbox"
          checked={checked}
          onChange={(e) => setChecked(e.target.checked)}
          id="confirm-checkbox"
        />
        <label htmlFor="confirm-checkbox">\uC8FC\uBB38\uD558\uB824\uB294 \uAC83\uC744 \uD655\uC778\uD558\uC168\uB098\uC694?</label>
        <br />
        <button disabled={!checked} type="submit">
          \uC8FC\uBB38 \uD655\uC778
        </button>
      </form>
    </div>
  );
}
export default SummaryPage;
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:1},this),`

\uADC0\uCC2E\uAE34 \uD558\uC9C0\uB9CC \uB098\uC911\uC744 \uC0DD\uAC01\uD574\uC11C\uB294 \uAF2D \uD544\uC694\uD55C \uC18C\uD504\uD2B8\uC6E8\uC5B4 \uBC29\uBC95\uB860\uC774\uB77C\uACE0 \uC0DD\uAC01\uD55C\uB2E4.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/dev-deokgyung/blog/Duck-Blog_v2/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-76712a64-2912-4eb0-a067-aa4d78432d78.mdx",lineNumber:103,columnNumber:1},this),`
